name: Jackson

topics.response_text: ...Bone ain't too bad, either. Heh... Bone.

conversation.response_text: Oh yeah? So he's the one that's going out to the Steelyard, huh?
Well then, I hope you also said goodbye! HAHAHAHA! Alright, play time's over. Get to work, grinders.

description:
Jackson is a 36 year-old Caucasian Male.

A gritty man who can often be found near restroom areas in GNR plaza, close to the Museum of Technology entrance. He wears scavenged raider armor and carries a worn 10mm pistol.

Jackson's Personality: Brutal and self-serving. Jackson operates on the principle of 'might makes right.' He shows no remorse for his actions, viewing others as either obstacles to be removed or opportunities to be exploited.

Jackson's Backstory: Born in the harsh wasteland shortly after the Great War, Jackson learned from a young age that only the strong survive. His parents were killed by raiders when he was just a boy, forcing him to fend for himself in the dangerous Capital Wasteland. As he grew older, he joined a raider group that specialized in ambushing travelers and selling them into slavery. When his group was decimated by a Brotherhood of Steel patrol, Jackson struck out on his own but continued his slaving operations on a smaller, more cautious scale.
